archimate:Product.name: TOGAF
archimate:Product.documentation:
En industristandard, generisk virsomehtsarkitektur *metode*. Basert på TAFIN (Technical Architecture for Information Management) Relatert til andre rammeverk: Zachman, DoD, FEAF, TEAF (produkter) og Architmate (et språk). Archimate is a graphical...
TOGAF is a framework/process for: developing, implementing, maintaining - enterprise archiectures.
Bok: Enterprise Architecture at Work, Lankhorst (gratis pdf).
